{"id":986943939,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1688561907,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/986943939/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        vector<char> validChars;\n\n        // Collect valid alphanumeric characters\n        for (char c : s) {\n            if (isalnum(c)) {\n                validChars.push_back(tolower(c));\n            }\n        }\n\n        int left = 0;\n        int right = validChars.size() - 1;\n\n        // Check if the valid characters form a palindrome\n        while (left < right) {\n            if (validChars[left] != validChars[right]) {\n                return false;  // Not a palindrome\n            }\n            left++;\n            right--;\n        }\n\n        return true;  // Palindrome\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
